Sentencas: In this study A-site deficient lanthanum doped strontium titanate, which is considered as a promising, redox-stable candidate for full ceramic anodes in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs), was produced by nanoparticle-based spray pyrolysis.
Titulo: Synthesis and performance of A-site deficient lanthanum-doped strontium titanate by nanoparticle based spray pyrolysis

Sentencas: In this process cost-effective nitrate salts and titania nanoparticles are used as precursors.
Titulo: Synthesis and performance of A-site deficient lanthanum-doped strontium titanate by nanoparticle based spray pyrolysis

Sentencas: LST with a nominal composition of La0.2Sr0.7TiO3 showed limited stability at temperatures higher than 1290 degrees C.
Titulo: Synthesis and performance of A-site deficient lanthanum-doped strontium titanate by nanoparticle based spray pyrolysis

Sentencas: It was observed that minor contents of secondary phases, which form at elevated temperatures, invoke a drastic loss of the electrical performance.
Titulo: Synthesis and performance of A-site deficient lanthanum-doped strontium titanate by nanoparticle based spray pyrolysis

Sentencas: Thermal stability is significantly increased by a slight enrichment of strontium.
Titulo: Synthesis and performance of A-site deficient lanthanum-doped strontium titanate by nanoparticle based spray pyrolysis

Sentencas: The phase pure A-site deficient LST shows remarkably higher electrical performance than similar stoichiometric counterparts.
Titulo: Synthesis and performance of A-site deficient lanthanum-doped strontium titanate by nanoparticle based spray pyrolysis

Sentencas: Reductive sintering results in a conductivity as high as 600 S cm(-1) at 600 degrees C.
Titulo: Synthesis and performance of A-site deficient lanthanum-doped strontium titanate by nanoparticle based spray pyrolysis

Sentencas: Furthermore the A-site deficient LST shows a high redox-stability and fast redox-kinetics.
Titulo: Synthesis and performance of A-site deficient lanthanum-doped strontium titanate by nanoparticle based spray pyrolysis

Sentencas: With these properties IST is a suitable material for the fabrication of a new generation of Ni-free ceramic SOFC anodes.
Titulo: Synthesis and performance of A-site deficient lanthanum-doped strontium titanate by nanoparticle based spray pyrolysis

Sentencas: Secondary phases have a significant influence on the electrical conductivity and redox behaviour.
Titulo: Synthesis and performance of A-site deficient lanthanum-doped strontium titanate by nanoparticle based spray pyrolysis
Synthesis and performance of A-site deficient lanthanum-doped strontium titanate by nanoparticle based spray pyrolysis
Synthesis and performance of A-site deficient lanthanum-doped strontium titanate by nanoparticle based spray pyrolysis
